(Jeniff, I'm in a cleared area.  Hell Beast and his group already went 
through here, there wouldn't be any auto-guns left, unless for some strange 
reason you have twenty of them able to pop out of the cieling, and that would 
take a long time to assemble all throughout the Ark, so I'm not going to take 
the damage since that would be moding on your part, you don't have infinite 
auto-guns)


Injector/ Manterror:

::Injector stumbles back from a blast to his chest from Antagony, he grunts 
in annoyance::
"End this quick, Manterror!  We're missing the actual fighting!" (The 
bee/fish fires off a few stinger missiles)

"You're the boss!" ::Manterror fires off three ion disks at Antagony::

(Note: Ion Disks are basically, ion disks.  They can go through walls and 
such, but Manterror's are designed to not stop until they hit enemy armor, so 
if they miss they go slicing through until they fizz out or something strong 
enough stops them)
